meanings.definition: The state of being obsolete or no longer in use.
meanings.sent1: The obsoleteness of the typewriter was evident in the modern office setting.
meanings.sent2: The obsoleteness of VHS tapes became apparent with the rise of streaming services.
meanings.sent3: The obsoleteness of floppy disks made the IT department chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The obsoleteness of dial-up internet is like using a horse-drawn carriage in a world of sports cars.
meanings.sent5: The obsoleteness of pagers is as clear as day in today's smartphone era.

meanings.definition: The quality of being outdated or no longer relevant.
meanings.sent1: The obsoleteness of the old fashion trends was noticeable at the party.
meanings.sent2: The obsoleteness of the software led to the need for an upgrade.
meanings.sent3: The obsoleteness of the flip phone seemed comical in a room full of smartphones.
meanings.sent4: The obsoleteness of the ancient ruins spoke volumes about the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The obsoleteness of the manual typewriter was a stark reminder of technological progress.
